item.title: Sarah add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I believe that everything happens for a reason. People change so that you can learn to let go, things go wrong so that you appreciate them when they're right, you believe lies so you eventually learn to trust no one but yourself, and sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Lucille Ball
item.description: "It's a helluva start, being able to recognize what makes you happy. " -- Lucille Ball

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "If you can make a woman laugh, you can make her do anything." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Sarah add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "I solemnly swear that I am up to no good." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. You're on your own. And you know what you know. And YOU are the one who'll decide where to go..." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I am good, but not an angel. I do sin, but I am not the devil. I am just a small girl in a big world trying to find someone to love." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Sarah add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Bill Keane
item.description: "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present." -- Bill Keane

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "A person's a person, no matter how small." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, Nothing is going to get better. It's not." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Think left and think right and think low and think high. Oh, the thinks you can think up if only you try!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You're off to Great Places! Today is your day! Your mountain is waiting, So... get on your way!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I am the Lorax. I speak for the trees. I speak for the trees for the trees have no tongues." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sarah add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein
